commands.sakura_server.error.not_player: This command is not issued by the player.
commands.sakura_server.removeLore.ok: Successfully cleared the lore information of %d item.
enchantment.sakura_server.vein_mine.need: You're hungry. Go get something to eat and chain mine!
item.sakura_server.dragon_sword.skill.de: Deplete 30% of your current life value to gain Dragon's Roar.
Dragon Roar: +4 Attack Power, +80% Attack Speed, +30% Movement Speed
Slowly restores 20% of your maximum health.
item.sakura_server.soul_gem.dead: The creature you bound is dead!!His SoulGem sparkles....
item.sakura_server.soul_gem.fail.has_ent: This SoulGem already has a binding!
item.sakura_server.soul_gem.fail.not_fou: There are no creatures bound to you within 40 squares~
item.sakura_server.soul_gem.fail.not_own: You don't own him, you can't bind him!
item.sakura_server.soul_gem.fail.not_tam: He's not tamed yet! Unable to bind
item.sakura_server.soul_gem.found: Your dog is in x:%d,y:%d,z:%d ♪ He's shining ♪
item.sakura_server.stardust_wand.skill.d: Grants 10s of broken healing to creatures in a 5 square radius, and deals 8 points of damage.
Restore 8 life points to your pet!
Crouching then works on other players and other players' pets as well!

stat.sakura_server.vein_mine_count: Total number of vein mine cubes
